noNetwork2: because this app is cloud based, you need an active network connection.
contactSuccess2: thanks for your message. i will contact you with this email:
pwResetSuccess1: an email to reset your password was sent. please check also your spam folder.
contactError1: unfortunately there is an error. you can try it later or you can contact me under elias@eliasschneider.com
contact1: do you have a feature suggestion, an error to report or something else? you can contact me.
dreamGrade1: your grade for the next exam should be:
gradelyP1: i invested a lot of time and money in this app. of course I want, that this app is free. with gradely plus you can help me, so i can make this app better.
gradelyP5: gradely plus can only be bought on a mobile device. after the purchase, you have gradely on any of your devices.
gradelyPS2: thank you so much for being a gradely plus user. Enjoy it!
custom2: looks empty here? more gradely plus features coming soon.
userinfoP2: please re enter your password to save your changes
userInfoRP1: to change your password, click the button below. you get an email, there you can change your password.
userinfoD2: caution! Do you really want to delete your account and your grades? this can't be undone.
weakPassword: your password is too weak. Try again.
invalidEmail: This email is invalid. Try again.
emailInUse: an account with this email already exists. Try again.
wrongPassword: this password is wrong. Try again.
userNotFound: an account whith this email doesn't exist. Try again.
empty3: above, to get your grades from the server.
statsDateBadlyFormatted: your grade dates are badly formatted. only this format is accepted: yyyy.MM.dd. please rechoose the dates in your grades, then you can see your statistics.
statsContainsNoDate: some of your grades don't have dates. please add a date to every of your grade to see your statistics.
stats1: This shows your grades along the date time period.
notConnectedToInternet: You're not connected to the internet. Please enable the internet to continue.
